DOC.brief_summary: Non interventional study collect patient report outcomes . The study aim assess disease burden chronic urticaria patient record therapy use daily clinical practice UK impact quality life work productivity individual patient .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must 18 year old Subject must willing able provide write informed consent collection analysis routine data PROs Subject must medically confirm diagnosis chronic urticaria present 2 month . Subject must refactory least one H1 antihistamine Subjects estimation treat physician unlikely available full duration followup period 24 month . Subjects take must take part concurrent urticarial study .
